backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, daily totals with branch-scoped storage (key format: branch:principal:date), and access control integration with authorization mixins for user and admin permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of frontend source files including components for calculator, balance sheet, authentication, printing, and catalog management with branch-scoped storage.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes, plus print-specific styles for receipt rendering with monospace fonts and proper spacing.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title "Varshini Classic Cuisine" and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with branch authentication gate, view mode switching (calculator/dailyTotals/optimizeBill), print view routing, error boundary integration, and startup failure handling.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that catches render errors and external startup errors, displaying CrashFallbackScreen when errors occur.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGatePag: Authentication gate page requiring branch login with optional Internet Identity connection, displaying app branding and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchLogin: Branch login form component with username/password inputs, submission handling, error display, and double-submission prevention using the useBranchAuth hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchSessi: Displays the current branch user and provides a logout button when authenticated, using the useBranchAuth hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states, error handling, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/CrashFallbackScr: Error fallback UI component displaying error messages with reload button and user-friendly instructions.
frontend/src/components/GuidanceNoticeBa: Notice bar component displaying draft link expiration warning with copy-to-clipboard functionality for current URL.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/Balan: Daily totals view displaying revenue and item quantities per day with day selection, clear all functionality, and success/error feedback alerts.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/hooks: Custom hook managing daily total state, fetching balance sheet data from backend with localStorage fallback, and listening for storage changes scoped to the current branch.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/ledge: Utilities for managing branch-scoped daily totals ledger in localStorage, including loading/saving ledger entries, computing daily summaries, and clearing cache.
frontend/src/features/calculator/billCod: Utility function that generates unique bill codes in format BILL-YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS-XXXX with timestamp and random alphanumeric suffix.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines CatalogItem interface and PREDEFINED_CATALOG array containing restaurant menu items organized by category (South Indian, North Indian, Rice & Biryani, Curries, Snacks, Beverages, Desserts) with prices and stock status.
Provides currency and number formatting utilities for INR with thousand separators and 2 decimal places using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/features/calculator/lineIte: Contains utilities for case-insensitive matching between catalog items and line items, including label normalization, finding matching items, and computing added quantities.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: Catalog UI for browsing, searching, adding, and managing predefined items with categories, images, out-of-stock toggles, and quick-add functionality.
TypeScript type definitions for PredefinedItemCatalog component props including catalog items, line items, and callback handlers.
frontend/src/features/calculator/PrintBi: React component that renders a printable bill receipt with header, line items table, totals breakdown (subtotal, tax, discount, final total), and footer for Varshini Classic Cuisine.
frontend/src/features/calculator/savedBi: Manages bill persistence to branch-scoped localStorage with functions to save, retrieve, and clear bills including line items, tax, discount, breakdown, and format snapshots.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator page component managing line items, tax, discount, and catalog integration with features to add/remove items, save bills to ledger, print receipts, and sync daily totals to backend.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: TypeScript type definitions for LineItem, CalculatorState, and CalculationBreakdown interfaces used throughout the calculator feature.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Core calculation utilities including safe number parsing, line total calculation, subtotal aggregation, and full breakdown computation with tax and discount logic.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils/r: Promise-based utility that reads an image file using FileReader and converts it to a base64 data URL string with validation.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/branc: Utility that enforces fixed print location addresses for specific branch users (bachupally and nezampat), preventing user or backend overrides.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/Optim: Configuration page for setting default bill format options including receipt style selection, payment QR code upload, and print location address with branch-specific fixed address support.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/optim: Manages loading and saving bill format defaults (receipt style, payment scan URL, print location) to branch-scoped localStorage with enforcement of fixed branch addresses.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/recei: Defines receipt style types ('classic' and 'compact') with their metadata and sets 'classic' as the default style.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useOp: React hook that loads bill format defaults from localStorage, saves them with fixed address enforcement, and optionally syncs to backend user profile when authenticated.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useSy: React hook that syncs bill print location from backend user profile to branch-scoped localStorage on authentication, skipping fixed branch users to preserve their enforced addresses.
frontend/src/features/print/PrintViewPag: Page component that loads a saved bill from branch-scoped storage by ID, renders it with the configured receipt style, and handles auto-printing and manual print triggers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranchAuth.tsx: React context provider and hook for branch-based authentication with hardcoded credentials, persisting login state to localStorage and triggering data migration on login/hydration.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyCurrentUrl.ts: React hook that copies the current page URL to clipboard using modern or fallback APIs, returning copy status (idle/success/error).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, daily totals, and balance sheets using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartupFailureHand: Custom hook that listens for unhandled promise rejections and errors during app startup, capturing them as startup error state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (light/dark modes) and print-specific styles for bill rendering.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/utils/branchScopedStorage.t: Utilities for branch-scoped localStorage keys with migration logic from legacy global keys to branch-namespaced storage.
frontend/src/utils/confirmDelete.ts: Provides confirmation dialog functions for deleting items and clearing all daily totals.
frontend/src/utils/iiProviderShim.ts: Shim that ensures a safe default Internet Identity provider URL is set from environment variables or falls back to production URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space and enabling dark mode, animations, typography, and container queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature request AR-1 to exclude print view page from screenshot functionality.
